title: nittam tudi
sahitya:
nittam tudi sheidu ni uyndiDu manamE muttukumaranadu padattai dhyAnittu


anupallavi

  cittam unadil adanai siridu nEramEnum bhakti perugak-karudi paravashattODurugi


caraNam    narttana nIlakaNTha nAtharin puttiranai uttami umaiyuLLam uvanda vicittiranai
vittaga guruparanai vIra shirOnmaNiyai bhakta paripAlanai bAlasubrahmaNyanai
